DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter, single arm, non-interventional, observational study will evaluate the efficacy and safety of obinutuzumab in daily clinical practice in participants with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). The study will also assess cost of disease management. The total length of the study is 42 months.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Obinutuzumab Evaluating Efficacy, Safety and Cost of Disease Management in Participants With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia and Comorbidities
DOC.criteria: Participants with untreated CLL and comorbidities, for which the physician has already decided to use obinutuzumab in association with chlorambucil Participation in another clinical trial during the study
